body:
PLEASE NOTE IM NOT ADVERTISING THIS IS A SERVER WHERE PEOPLE CAN MAKE MAPS WITH THEIR FRIENDS FOR AVICUS GAMES LIKE NEBULA , NEXUS etc.

Now I know many Of You are probley thinking that oh SweetMango already has one and I am well aware of that I just made a secound one so why not come and try it out ! You can build maps on there just contact me or another staff on the server we will create you a world and you can come and build ,but please note you cant just  come on the server and build you have to be promoted to a Builder so you can build, just so We can trust you first although there is other mini-games on there just ignore them we just play them with our Minecraft friends. Join and play... I will open it soon for all you map makers that want to build maps with your friends. Once you have built your map just contact me or other Mods on the server and I will upload it to mediafire so you can download it ! I Will open it soon when everything is working correctly !

Comment Below What you think and do you think you would visit!

Available Slots: 12 Players
IP: OPEN NOW
Owners : 7788james and ElementProHD

I will send you ip via skype ! Or email me at willbob101@hotmail.com and I'll reply with ip in it and looking for 1 or 2 mods

replies.body:
Remember: You can't write IPs in the forums nor the server, otherwise, you'll get banned. Just saying so when the IP comes out you don't put it here, try giving it out throught Skype. Still if It's Avicus related, Moderators won't tolerate the giveaway of other IPs.
Thanks ^-^
